channel.title: I still need help with teleport spells
channel.description:
How can I change what the teleportation spells say, how can I make a list, and how to change the coords. EXAMPLE:
If you click "Lumbridge Teleport" It will say "Pk teleport" Instead.
When you click it, I want a list of which pk site, like "Edgeville, Varrok, and Mage Bank."
Heelp?

item.title: I still need help with teleport spells
item.dc:creator: @Adelmas Adelmas
item.source: I still need help with teleport spells

item.title: I still need help with teleport spells
item.dc:creator: @o.O_O.o o.O O.o
item.description:
@o.O_O.o wrote:

You should have a text handler?

Just make it open an interface with options, rather than teleporting.

Read full topic
